name: Healthy & Delicious: Chicken Paprikash
description: On Mondays, Kristen Swensson of Cheap, Healthy, Good swings by these parts to share healthy and delicious recipes with us. Lots of healthy, frugal dishes have the ability to wow a crowd. Simply put, they’re Suitable for Company dishes. Or...
recipeIngredient: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breast, filleted and cut into 1-inch strips
1 cup thinly sliced red bell pepper (about 1 medium)
1/8 to 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (if not using hot paprika)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat canola oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add chicken; cook 5 minutes or until browned, stirring occasionally. Remove from pan, and keep warm.

Add onion, bell pepper, and garlic to pan; sauté 4 minutes or until tender. Return chicken to pan. Stir in cream and remaining ingredients; cover and simmer 5 minutes or until chicken is done and sauce is slightly thick. Serve with egg noodles.
